node.name: Q for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Please note that q4e source code has been donated to the Eclipse IAM project and recent versions are published under that name. You can find it on the marketplace too.

Q is an Apache Maven plugin for Eclipse that will let you use Maven 2 from the Eclipse IDE

This plugin better integrates the development and building processes by bringing Maven into the Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

As a bonus, you also get support for Web development with WTP and the ability to analyze complex dependencies on your builds.
node.body:
Please note that q4e source code has been donated to the Eclipse IAM project and recent versions are published under that name. You can find it on the marketplace too.

Q is an Apache Maven plugin for Eclipse that will let you use Maven 2 from the Eclipse IDE

This plugin better integrates the development and building processes by bringing Maven into the Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

As a bonus, you also get support for Web development with WTP and the ability to analyze complex dependencies on your builds.
